author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

HLT menu development for 14_0_X (1/N) [14_0_X]

Also includes migration to ConfDb template CMSSW_14_0_0

The following CMSHLT Jira tickets are included:

https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3048: [TSG/HIon] Removal of EventContent/Stream/PD related to HIHLTMonitor
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3035: [BPH] HLT_ZeroBias prescale for physics menu
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3027: [L1T] Set hltGtStage2ObjectMap AXOL1TLModelVersion ="GTADModel_v3" .
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3025: [Scouting] Extending the Jet Eta cut
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3023: [B2G] Request of tagger migration in FivePFJet+2b-tag path
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3022: [HIG] Update L1 seeds for VBFHToCC HLT path
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3020: [SUS] Removal of VBF + X paths and replacing with VBF-exclusive paths
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2989: [PPS] Add new module in ALCAPPSPrompt 
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2983: [TSG] Removal of hltParticleFlowClusterHFForEgammaUnseeded
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2981: [TSG] Removal of deprecated GRun Paths (post Run2023)
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2980: [TSG] Remove unused Paths from HLT combined menu (post Run2023)

#### PR validation:

TSG tests

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of #44023 (to data taking release)
title: HLT menu development for 14_0_X (1/N) [14_0_X]
